missionaries
Class MissionnaryState

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractState
      missionaries.MissionnaryState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IState, java.io.Serializable
public class MissionnaryState
extends AbstractState

A state is defined by :

  • Mg, the number of missionaries on the left bank.
  • Cg, the number of cannibals on the left bank.
  • The bank where the boat is (initially : left)
Initial numbers of people, and boat capacity, are part of Contraintes

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
